title: DJI Osmo: Say goodbye to shaky 4K video (hands-on)
text:
DJI Osmo: Say goodbye to shaky 4K video (hands-on) 
Published By: Pocket-lint.com - Today 
Best known for its drones, DJI took to the stage at the launch of the new Osmo and talked about itself as a camera company. The real aim of ...
